title: Chocolate

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Each night, choose magic or girl.
> *Magic* — Choose up to three other players. The first is roleblocked, the second can't vote the next day, and the third's defense is lowered by one stage for the night.
> *Girl* — Choose up to three players. All abilities used against the first tonight succeed no matter what, the second gets converted into a random role, and the third gets dealt a Basic attack.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not choose a mode three times in a row
- __**Part of the Daily Streak faction**__

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value:
Your goal depends on which of magic or girl you chose more of. You can't win if it's even.
> *Magic* — Hang every criminal and evildoer.
> *Chocolate* — Win with any evil faction.
